mapper.select: SELECT image_id as imageId, user_id as userId, class_id as classId, image_text as imageText, image_path as imagePath, image_gmt_create as createTime, image_gmt_modified as updateTime from image where is_deleted = '1' and image_text = #{imageText}
SELECT image_id, user_id, class_id, image_text, image_path, image_gmt_create, image_gmt_modified from image where user_id = #{userId} and is_deleted = '1'
SELECT image_id, user_id, class_id, image_text, image_path, image_gmt_create, image_gmt_modified from image where user_id = #{userId} and class_id = #{classId} and is_deleted = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image ( image_text, image_path, is_deleted, user_id, class_id, image_gmt_create, image_gmt_modified) VALUES ( #{imageText}, #{imagePath}, #{isDeleted}, #{userId}, #{classId}, #{createTime}, ##{updateTime})
